content: Press Release - Release of Draft for the formation of a student body of TSAS.
Press Release - Clarification on formation of Telangana Students Association for Solidarity [TSAS].
Are you passionate about promoting and safeguarding the genuine interest of students? Join the TSAS and be a part of the movement dedicated to making a real difference.
Press Release - Notification of formation of TSAS and permission for SAC Auditorium to conduct an awareness session.
Press Release - Registration of TELANGANA STUDENTS ASSOCIATION FOR SOLIDARITY [TSAS] RGUKT BASAR.
